text: Christine Louise Lampard (née Bleakley, born 2 February 1979) is a broadcaster from Northern Ireland. ==In television== She has hosted various television shows with Adrian Chiles. These include The One Show (2007–2010) and Daybreak (2010–11). With Phillip Schofield she has presented Dancing on Ice (2012–14) and This Morning (2013–16). Lampard has also presented non-fiction series for ITV including Off The Beaten Track (2013) and Wild Ireland (2015). She has been the presenter of the ITV lunchtime chat show Loose Women since 2016. Category:1979 births Category:Living people
title: Christine Lampard
